Description:
Street Appeal on Steroids and Lo-Maintenance Lifestyle
This superb starter or downsizer is just one year young. A period styled brick home which offers ease of living whilst retaining the benefits of well established (flat) surrounds including an orange tree dripping with fruit.
A front deck with led lighting welcomes you into the property with high ceilings and sophisticated colour tones. Inside the spacious open plan living has all the comforts you would expect including plantation shutters and double blinds.
Featuring three great sized bedrooms, master boasting full ensuite and walk in robe, robed secondary bedrooms and a beautifully appointed gloss white kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the living and dining zones, sliding doors open to reveal a decked outdoor sitting area with rustic bar that takes full advantage of the generous rear gardens with garden shed (plenty of space for play, extra vehicles, future shedding etc.)
Double carport with access to the back yard, ducted heating throughout.
The neighbourhood has under-gone a transformation in recent times becoming more like a street in the Hamptons than the Cockatoo of old. Close to the newly upgraded sporting facilities of Mountain Road Reserve that includes a basketball stadium, bootcamp style group fitness classes, cricket & footy ground, netball courts, athletics track, walking tracks and home to the Cockatoo Archery Club. Most school transport is available from here or nearby and Cockatoo township is just under 2kms away.
Insights: 4 Carawa Street, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2019 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Potential Plus Subdividable 10.5 acres!
This is an incredible development opportunity in Cockatoo. With 10 ½ acres of undulating land zoned as low density residential (LDRZ), there is development potential (STCA) for the astute investor.
Currently the block has a quality built 3 bedroom brick veneer home featuring an entry hall, living and dining area, kitchen with meals area and a huge ballroom complete with polished floorboards, bar and retro pendant lights. The home has a triple garage, single carport and a spacious shed with separate workshop.
With an elevated outlook, this property has the perfect blend of cleared and treed areas. With an open and sunny aspect, this property also includes a dam. The potential of this property is the development opportunity - this acreage could be easily subdivided into 3 large blocks or multiple smaller blocks (STCA).
Bordering the Cockatoo Recreation & Sporting Reserve, this property is ideally located being close to the Cockatoo township and a short walk to public transport.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
LIFESTYLE HOME WITH THE LOT
Positioned in a quite and leafy location of Cockatoo, is this well maintained and perfectly presented family home. The property features lock up garages for four cars and is ideally suited to the tradesperson or for those buyers looking for a property that offers plenty of space to park machinery, trailers or boats. Set on over 2,400sqm and offering a mature landscaped garden, a large selection of fruit trees, vegie patch, a wood fired pizza oven and a unique wood fired Finnish sauna, ideally located at the rear of an external billiard room. The home features three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes. The master has a walk through wardrobe to a good sized ensuite and a separate main bathroom. The living areas include a light and bright lounge and dining, timber kitchen that overlooks the meals and second living area opening out to a fully enclosed sunroom. Additional extras include ducted heating, central air conditioning, under house storage and an extensive sealed driveway. Dont miss this fantastic package!
Due to strong market conditions please call to confirm open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
A FAMILY FAVOURITE WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR!
Set on a quiet country lane with no through access, this family home stands proudly on approximately ¾ of an acre & is ready to welcome a new family to a wonderful lifestyle. The size will impress with 4 large bedrooms plus separate study nook, spacious living areas, high ceilings & floor to ceiling windows which allow both plenty of natural light to shine through & also provides a lovely view of nature & greenery from every angle of the home. The master bedroom is large enough to have a parents retreat so you can lounge around away from the rest of the family & relax in a big sofa while you read a book in solitude! Designed for comfort & relaxation, this home is the perfect mix of modern taste, yet has the character of country too. A stunning kitchen with huge walk in pantry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & a view over the flat yard which is a haven for kids, pets & family gatherings will be a feature you will instantly fall in love with. Ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, coonara & a stunning brick open fire place ensures you can relax through all the seasons in comfort. A new shed with workshop, bullnose verandahs, swimming pool & mature silver birches complete this perfect setting! Call us & inspect today!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
SO CONVENIENT! WALK TO SCHOOL, SHOPS AND THE BUS
Neat, well maintained and the perfect step up into the property market or a portfolio addition for the smart investor. Positioned on just over a ¼ of an acre of established gardens featuring plenty of raised garden boxes awaiting your botanic skills to cultivate your own veggie garden.
This welcoming home has gleaming polished floorboards and tiles to the wet areas, large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge, three spacious bedrooms, bathroom with bath and shower, laundry and separate toilet. Ducted heating and a split system for year-round comfort. You are sure to get plenty of use out of the spacious covered rear deck for BBQs and gatherings. Other features are under house storage and plenty of off-street parking.
How fabulous to get out of the rent race, secure the first home buyers stamp duty exemption and finally call a property our home. Looking forward to showing you through and assisting with this next stage of your lives, contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
CHARACTER HOME WITH COMMANDING VIEWS ON ONE ACRE
Set sale by 22/07/2019 6:00pm
***SALE BY SET DATE - MONDAY 22nd JULY, 2019 at 6pm (Unless Sold Prior)***
This is why you come to the Hills to live. A beautifully presented character home set on a fully fenced, completely useable block of 4047m2 with gorgeous views to Mt Dandenong. The home features all of the hallmarks of a true period home with polished floor boards, ornate cornicing, corbelled arches and picture rails that combine with every modern convenience including ducted heating and evaporative cooling. A separate living room is ideal as a quiet place to watch the latest release whilst the family/meals area has a welcoming solid fuel fire that will have the family nestled around in front of on cooler evenings. The kitchen is ideally located to allow plenty of room for the chef to create a culinary masterpiece and has double doors out to the wrap around verandahs. Large picture windows throughout provide lovely views of the garden and will ensure you can watch the children and four legged friends as they romp around in the fully enclosed yard. Dual access allows for easy access for extra vehicles and also accesses the double garage that also serves as a man cave.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to confirm open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
HOME OF PLENTY
In a sun-filled ½ acre, sits this lovely family home with plenty of character & warmth. Your heart will instantly feel at home.
Located in a family friendly street only a few minutes drive to Cockatoo town centre with all it has to offer, this Western Red Cedar home is ready for you to enjoy the hills life. This 3 bedroom family home with a flexible 2nd level loft has timber featured inside and out, an open brick fireplace and coonara, plus a huge vaulted timber ceiling. The main bedroom has a freshly updated ensuite and walk in robe. Outside youll enjoy the clear usable yard, large covered deck, a wood store, shed and cubby perfect for kids, pets, cars or machinery. Theres also room for a 4 car garage, subject to council approval (the site is prepared where the old one was). Your established orchard has an abundance of fruit; theres lemon, plumb, quince, orange, apples, mandarins, figs, olives, pear, apricot and Shiraz, Pinot and Merlot vines! Plenty right?
Dont miss this opportunity for you and your family as a home with this much to offer doesnt come along every day.
Contact Mat Fitch 0473363606 or Mick Dolphin 0429684522 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
First Home Buyers or Investors - You Won't Find A Better Price!!!
Perfect for the first home buyer or for those looking to downsize or invest! This character filled log cabin has an elevated position nicely situated at the rear of the block providing both views and privacy.
This neat and tidy home features a living area with a brick feature wall encasing a wood fire heater to keep the home cosy and warm as well as a new split system for year round comfort. The kitchen is spacious and bright with plenty of bench space, dishwasher and a large walk in pantry. The bedrooms are both robed and there is also a large storage room off the back pergola providing a good use of space.
Outdoor the features continue with a sealed driveway, single carport, storage shed and a garden shed. Fully fenced, there is plenty of space for kids or furry friends to play safely in the yard that is filled with stunning mature gums and evergreen shrubs.
Within easy walking distance to public transport and sports ground, this home offers comfortable and convenient living. This home is definitely not one to be missed.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Private, Character 3 Bedroom Home on Half an Acre!
Tucked away privately behind a lush garden is this absolutely charming 3 bedroom log cabin home with bull nose verandah situated on just under ½ acre.
Inside the charm continues with dado paneling, vaulted ceilings and a solid fuel wood fire to add to the ambience, whilst the home has mains gas ducted heating and split system cooling for comfort and convenience all year round. The home has zoned living with 2 spacious robed bedrooms and the large family bathroom at one end of the home and the Master bedroom with walk through robe and a substantial ensuite with corner spa overlooking the garden at the other.
The newly renovated kitchen, featuring stunning Tassie Oak benchtops, is lovely and light and adjoins the open plan lounge and dining area where there is enough space for family and friends to gather.
Outside the features continue with an undercover entertaining area with outdoor fireplace the perfect place to relax or entertain all year round, a double garage/workshop with concrete floor and power, a 9000 litre water tank, 1.6KW solar panels, a chook shed and kids cubby house. Enjoy meandering along the garden paths amongst the mature trees and landscaped gardens knowing the fully fenced property will allow kids and pets to play safely.
With space for all the family and located minutes from Cockatoo and 15 minutes from Pakenham and the Freeway, this home must be seen to be truly appreciated.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Big Family Home with Heaps of Natural Light, Character, Comfort & Convenience !?
* Situated an easy 15 minute stroll to Cockatoo, the dog park, the Kindergarten, the Primary School, local shops, cafes & public transport this split level 4 bedroom family home leaves nothing to do but move in & enjoy!
* This charming property gets heaps of sun and with an elevated aspect the front and side decks provide a wonderful view and the perfect place to relax and enjoy the lush green surroundings whilst listening to Puffing Billy chug by.
* The home features 4 good sized, robed bedrooms, the Master with a walk through robe, an ensuite & direct access to a private, undercover courtyard with 6 person outdoor spa.
* The huge living space with air conditioner and ceiling fans has a wood heater for ambiance and offers a wonderful feeling of space with cathedral ceilings, neutral tones and large windows which welcome the natural light & a peaceful treed outlook from every window.
* The well-appointed kitchen features a 5 burner gas stove, new electric oven with separate grill, new dishwasher & convenient island bench & opens onto the 2nd living/sunroom area which has an air conditioner & access to a 2nd fully fenced outdoor entertaining area.
* Add to this mains gas ducted heating throughout, a large laundry and plenty of storage space.
* Outside the property is fully fenced into 4 secure yards making it ideal for the kids & four legged friends to play safely. Also included is a double lock-up shed with workshop and a beautifully landscaped garden full of ferns, waratahs, roses and magnolias.
* With all services connected this home is quirky, sunny, comfortable and conveniently located and ready for you to move in and enjoy!
Call Samantha Scott today on 0438 680 032 as this property is ready to go and one of the sunniest spots in the hills - don't miss out!

Description:
Over ½ Acre Provides Plenty Of Space To Play!
This is one for the family! Four bedroom home on just over a half an acre of land provides the space to stretch out!
This cedar home is situated back from the road on an elevated aspect with a full length front verandah, the perfect place to stop and take in the surrounding views and enjoy the tranquillity.
Inside the large family and dining area features cathedral ceilings providing the space for the family to gather. The warmth from the wood fire heater will provide the cosy ambience during the cooler months and with the ducted heating system and split system cooling your climate comfort will be assured throughout the year. On this level there is a large robed bedroom, a timber kitchen with a pantry, dishwasher and ample bench space, a study nook under the stairs and a large family laundry. The upper level consists of three robed bedrooms the generously sized Master has a walk through robe to a two way ensuite.
Outside there is a spacious deck where you can relax and watch over the kids playing in the large back yard. This area connects to a sheltered entertaining room where you could set up your own bar and seating the ideal place to enjoy with family and friends all year round.
Space is the big feature for this property with a large flat backyard with a garden shed, playground and dog yard providing the kids and fur kids plenty of space to run and play. There is also a large 4 car garage/workshop with power and concrete floor, plenty of space for your cars and tools.
Situated close to the large Cockatoo Recreation Reserve, public transport and Cockatoo township.
If youre searching for a place for your family, then this is a great property to see!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
CALL YOUR BROKER, THIS IS THE ONE!
Privately positioned on an allotment of 1000m2 approx. is this brick home, perfect for the first home buyer looking to get into the market, or investor looking for a great addition to their portfolio.
Size is deceiving, as the home offers a spacious and light filled front lounge with ambient open fire place, while the upper level boasts a family room ideal for a kids play area, home office or just to sit in front of the window and enjoy a book, while the convenience of gas ducted heating will keep you warm during winter.
All 4 bedrooms have access to the rear yard, while the master is complimented with a built in robe.
The timber kitchen is at the center of the home and provides plenty of bench space and an abundance of storage with a large pantry, 900mm free standing oven and dishwasher.
Leading out from the kitchen there is a large entertaining area, perfect for accommodating the entire family, while the back yard is terraced and fenced to ensure your furry friends are always secure, as are your tools in the 2 metal garden sheds with concrete floors.
Within walking distance to the Cockatoo sporting precinct; with footy oval, basketball stadium, netball courts and athletics track, access to walking tracks and public transport.
This isnt a property that will be on the market long, so call today and secure your inspection time!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY - MUST BE SOLD
Rent, renovate, or redevelop (STCA) this sensational starter home on a generous 2,298m2 approx. block. Immediately comfortable and providing a perfect place from which to develop your plans, this may be just the opportunity you have been waiting for.
This property is currently home to a traditional residence with an inviting front veranda, open plan lounge and dining, and classic kitchen with garden views. Bright bedrooms with BIRs, an original family bath, and laundry with WC, provide a classic floorplan with plenty of potential to make it your own.
Alternatively, this gently sloping allotment framed by Suffolk and Amphlett Avenues may spark your imagination to capitalise on this fantastic block. With ample privacy, mature trees, and 2 garden sheds to get you started, this is a beautiful backdrop for a forever family home.
With entry-point properties in todays market more difficult to secure than ever, this home near Cockatoo Primary, local shops, and Alma Treloar Reserve is well worth immediate inspection. Plan your viewing today and call Katie on 0428 744 498 or Suzie on 0490 506 910.

Description:
METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED FAMILY HOME
Located in a quiet no-through road, close to Cockatoo Main Street, schools and public transport, is this immaculately presented family home with great attention to detail, and simply nothing to be done. The home features two spacious living areas, with the formal lounge opening onto a fantastic covered and very private entertainment deck, where you can sit back and enjoy the magical views over the surrounding neighbourhood. The stunning central kitchen, is both light and bright, with plenty of bench space, large pantry, and has new quality appliances, perfect for those who love to cook! The master bedroom with huge walk in robe and ensuite, is positioned for privacy at the front of the home, and features sliding doors that open onto the deck. The remaining three bedrooms are positioned to the rear of the home, all are spacious with built in robes. Extra features include family bathroom, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, huge storage cupboards, magnificent polished spotted gum flooring and 9 foot ceilings. Step outside to a fully fenced rear yard, with a private outdoor sitting area, a double garage plus workshop area, plenty of space to park additional vehicles, and a water tank. All set on a manageable 1010m2 (approx.) block, in a leafy and very convenient location. This is a fantastic package that wont last long!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Welcome Home! And Its on a Flat Sunny Block!
Nothing comes close to the welcoming, homely feel of a character home, the comfort and the quirky layout. This home on a flat allotment of just over 2500 m2 has plenty of room for a thriving veggie patch and four legged friends, vehicle parking or even a large garage (subject to council approval).
Inside the home offers 3 bedrooms, a large open plan kitchen/diner with open fire place, butlers sink and larder, a sitting room with French Doors and cosy lounge with wood fire. The bathroom is impressive with soaking tub, custom vanity and separate shower. The home is blessed with excellent natural light and also has further opportunity to extend if required (see floorplan with endorsed plans for an extension in dotted form).
In a rural setting this property will suit a variety of needs, and with the opportunity with further expansion (with plans endorsed) and a flat block of almost 2/3 of an acre it really is a no brainer.
Just minutes to Cockatoo Township, bus connections, schools, shops and sporting clubs this character home is definitely one to put on the top of your shopping list. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection now!
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
LIGHT, BRIGHT AND SPACIOUS!
Nestled on a completely usable North facing allotment of 966m2 is this beautiful home that has been lovingly maintained by the current owners. Presented with care and pride the home has a living room with huge windows offering views of the garden and a cosy solid fuel heater for those cooler evenings to settle back in front of as well as ducted heating throughout. There is a meals area adjoining the kitchen which has hot plates, under bench oven, plenty of cupboards and dishwasher. All three bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by an updated bathroom with bath. The property is fully fenced allowing a safe haven for children and pets to romp around and has plenty of grassed area, a vegetable garden, fruit trees, 2 garden sheds, carport, paved outdoor area, an enclosed rear deck and colourful ornamental shrubs that attract a variety of birds. Just a short distance to the shopping centre, highly acclaimed Primary School and bus stop, this is a wonderful place to call home.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
THE IDEAL FAMILY HOME ON OVER 2600M2
Set on a leafy and private allotment of over 2600m2 is this stunning brick home built to accommodate the largest of families while enjoying the most convenient location.
The home provides a multitude of living areas including massive rumpus room leading outdoors, private lounge room ideal for home theatre, open plan dining and the entire upper floor parents retreat comprising of master suite with multiple built-in robes, full ensuite and spacious lounge ensure there is always a quiet place to get away and relax.
The remaining 4 bedrooms are all very generous in size and complemented with built-in robes while being serviced by the large family bathroom with separate toilet.
The kitchen is in keeping with the rest of the home and boasts ample space for the chef in the family and is accompanied by a walk-in pantry and private views from each window.
Special features include polished floors throughout, high ceilings, endless storage and gas ducted heating.
The 5ft wrap around verandah leads to the outdoor entertaining area that has been host to many milestone parties and is sure to continue to be the entertaining space of choice for the next lucky owner, while the entirely usable block will keep the children or pets occupied for hours as dad tinkers in the 6x9m shed.
Excellently located on a sealed road and walking distance to the highly regarded Cockatoo primary, public transport and the main street of Cockatoo ensures this property ticks all the boxes and is sure to be under high demand, so call today and organize an inspection!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
I REALLY LOVE COMING HOMETO MY GREAT BIG SHED!!!!
Its true! This property really has a shed to make a grown man/woman grin from ear to ear, measuring approx. 9.0x10.8, also a separate double carport and a rumpus which can easily be a workshop/hobby area.
But wait, thats just a small slice of what is on offer here today!
You're also sure to fall in love with the spacious, meticulously maintained split level timber home. Comprising of 4 big bedrooms, the main with bay window, WIR and full ensuite, a family bathroom with bath and shower, slate floored open plan dining/kitchen, lovely comfortable lounge with vaulted ceilings, full length shady front verandah and a huge sun-kissed rear deck overlooking a wonderful lawned play area for children and the four-legged family members. Set on ½ an acre of established gardens, it really is going to be a challenge to find a better family home with everything the whole family needs. Close to everything Cockatoo Township has on offer yet at the end of a no-through road. Sporting facilities, shops, schools, and the Josie Bysouth Reserve and Equestrian centre are nearby. Buying in Cockatoo has never been better!
We are really looking forward to showing you, call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection now.

Description:
Spacious Family Home In The Heart of Cockatoo!
If ample space for the growing family is a priority, then this Ranch style home on half an acre is the perfect option! Situated on an elevated allotment, this spacious brick home has 4 robed bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & zoned living. From the full length paved verandah you step inside to a large living & dining area with brick feature wall & inbuilt open fire place. Preparing meals for family & friends will be a pleasure in the Blackwood timber kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, ample bench space & breakfast bench. The slate floor & timber lined cathedral ceilings seamlessly connect the kitchen to the meals area & lounge room providing a comfortable sense of space. Soft natural light fills this home through full length colonial style windows & allows views of the surrounding gardens. Featuring 4 bedrooms Master with 2 double robes & an ensuite, there is plenty of space for families of any size. Also included is gas ducted heating, split system cooling & a ducted vacuum system. Outside features include a double car carport, double garage, sealed road access, tiered garden, selection of fruit trees, brick paving & an outdoor paved entertaining area to spend quality time with loved ones while enjoying the quiet surrounds. Just a short walk to Cockatoo shops, primary school, parklands & public transport.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
TRADIES AND HOME HOBBYISTS . SHED PLUS GARAGE PLUS WORKSHOP
Opportunity knocking for the first home buyer or downsizer with lots of toys to secure this neat and tidy updated home. Sitting pretty on just over ¼ acre useable allotment with full rear fencing, if you miss this one, your search for another may take a long time. Featuring 3 bedrooms, modern bathroom, spacious laundry, open plan living & dining. The kitchen is really going to impress the most avid masterchef with custom cabinetry, abundant storage and fabulous stainless appliances. Outside youll be spoilt for choice a large shed, covered entertaining, big double garage and double carport. Close to everything Cockatoo Township has on offer. Sporting facilities, shops, schools, the Josie Bysouth Reserve and Equestrian centre is just over the road. Its a great time to buy, so call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection now.

Description:
RELAXED LIFESTYLE ESCAPE
A tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life, this superb home provides a peaceful environment to raise a family, settle into retirement or as a superb entry into the property market. Beautifully detailed with bamboo floorboards, the light-filled lounge enjoys verdant vistas and cathedral ceilings, while the adjoining dining zone links through the attractive kitchen with upright cooker and soft close drawers. A spectacular space for entertaining rests outside in the form of a huge, covered alfresco deck that's accompanied by a bungalow/games room/4th bedroom and extends onto the backyard, ideal for burning off the children's excess energy. All three bedrooms run off the hallway and include built-in-robes, serviced by a family bathroom, separate toilet and full-sized laundry with deck access. Enhanced by fresh paintwork, gas heating, split system air conditioning, solar electricity panels, garden shed, water tank plus two driveways for excellent parking. Representing an idyllic lifestyle on 976sqm approx., close to schools, shops and public transport.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.
In-room Auction Tuesday 16th April at 7pm
Venue: 5/1849 Ferntree Gully Road, Ferntree Gully
To view the statement of information click the below link:
